                  abs PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  2800              CMP      r0,#0
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  da02              BGE      |L1.10|
000004  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
000008  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L1.10|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4770              BX       lr
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  clr_scrn PROC
;;;18     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;19     void clr_scrn(void)

;;;20     {
;;;21     char i;
;;;22     for (i=0;i<LCD_SIZE;i++)

;;;24     	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';

                  |L1.22|

00001c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;22
00001e  28c8              CMP      r0,#0xc8              ;22
000020  d3f9              BCC      |L1.22|
;;;25     	}
;;;26     }

;;;27     
                          ENDP

                  find PROC
;;;28     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;29     char find(char xy)
000024  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;30     {
;;;31     char i=0;
000026  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;32     do i++;
;;;33     while ((lcd_buffer[i]!=xy)&&(i<LCD_SIZE));
00002a  4af6              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
                  |L1.44|
00002c  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;32
000030  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;32

000036  d001              BEQ      |L1.60|
000038  28c8              CMP      r0,#0xc8
00003a  d3f7              BCC      |L1.44|

;;;35     return i;
;;;36     }

;;;37

                  bin2bcd_int PROC
;;;39     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;40     void bin2bcd_int(unsigned int in)
00003e  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;41     {
;;;42     
;;;43     char i=5;
;;;44     for(i=0;i<5;i++)

;;;45     	{
;;;46     	dig[i]=in%10;

;;;47     	in/=10;
;;;48     	}   
;;;49     }
000060  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;50     //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  bcd2lcd_zero PROC
;;;51     void bcd2lcd_zero(char sig)
000062  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;52     {
;;;53     char i;
;;;54     zero_on=1;
000064  4de9              LDR      r5,|L1.1036|
000066  f04f0101          MOV      r1,#1
00006a  7029              STRB     r1,[r5,#0]
;;;55     for (i=5;i>0;i--)
00006c  f04f0105          MOV      r1,#5
;;;56     	{
;;;57     	if(zero_on&&(!dig[i-1])&&(i>sig))
000070  4be5              LDR      r3,|L1.1032|
;;;58     		{
;;;59     		dig[i-1]=0x20;
000072  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
000076  f04f0700          MOV      r7,#0                 ;54
                  |L1.122|
00007a  782a              LDRB     r2,[r5,#0]            ;57  ; zero_on
00007c  b142              CBZ      r2,|L1.144|
00007e  185a              ADDS     r2,r3,r1              ;57
000080  f8124c01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]           ;57
000084  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.144|
000086  4281              CMP      r1,r0                 ;57
000088  d902              BLS      |L1.144|
00008a  f8026c01          STRB     r6,[r2,#-1]
00008e  e007              B        |L1.160|
                  |L1.144|
;;;60     		}
;;;61     	else
;;;62     		{
;;;63     		dig[i-1]=dig[i-1]+0x30;
000090  eb030201          ADD      r2,r3,r1
000094  f8124d01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]!
000098  f1040430          ADD      r4,r4,#0x30
00009c  7014              STRB     r4,[r2,#0]
;;;64     		zero_on=0;
00009e  702f              STRB     r7,[r5,#0]
                  |L1.160|
0000a0  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1              ;55
0000a4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;55
0000a6  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;55
0000a8  d1e7              BNE      |L1.122|
;;;65     		}	
;;;66     	}
;;;67     }             
0000aa  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;68     
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd_mmm PROC
;;;151    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;152    void int2lcd_mmm(signed short in,char xy,char des)
0000ac  b5fe              PUSH     {r1-r7,lr}
;;;153    {
0000ae  4603              MOV      r3,r0
;;;154    signed char i;
;;;155    char n;
;;;156    char s[10];

;;;158    char zero_on;
;;;159    char simb_num;
;;;160    
;;;161    if(in<0)

;;;162    	{
;;;163    	in=-in;

;;;165    	}
;;;166    
;;;167    for(i=0;i<10;i++)

;;;170    	in/=10;

0000dc  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;167

;;;174    simb_num=0;

;;;175    
;;;176    for (i=9;i>=0;i--)

;;;177    	{

;;;179    	     {
;;;180    	     s[i]=0x20;

                  |L1.242|

0000f8  f1bc0f00          CMP      r12,#0                ;178
0000fc  d103              BNE      |L1.262|

000100  dd01              BLE      |L1.262|
000102  542e              STRB     r6,[r5,r0]

                  |L1.262|
;;;181    	     }
;;;182    	else 
;;;183    	     {
;;;184    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;

000108  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30
00010c  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;185    	     zero_on=0;
00010e  f04f0300          MOV      r3,#0
;;;186    	     simb_num++;

000116  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.280|

00011c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;176
00011e  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;176
000120  dae7              BGE      |L1.242|
;;;187    	     }
;;;188    	 }
;;;189    	          
;;;190    if(minus=='-')	
000122  2f2d              CMP      r7,#0x2d
000124  d104              BNE      |L1.304|
;;;191         {
;;;192         s[simb_num++]=minus;

000128  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
00012c  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
00012e  542f              STRB     r7,[r5,r0]

;;;193         }    
;;;194    if(des)

;;;195         {
;;;196         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
000132  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
000134  e007              B        |L1.326|
                  |L1.310|
;;;197              {
;;;198              s[i]=s[i-1];

00013a  f8133c01          LDRB     r3,[r3,#-1]
00013e  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
000140  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;196
000144  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;196
                  |L1.326|
000146  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;196
000148  dcf5              BGT      |L1.310|
;;;199              }
;;;200         s[des]='.';

;;;201         simb_num++;

                  |L1.342|
;;;202         }
;;;203    	
;;;204    n=find(xy);

000158  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;205    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)

;;;206    	{
;;;207         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];

000162  e006              B        |L1.370|
                  |L1.356|
000164  eba00601          SUB      r6,r0,r1
000168  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]

000170  b249              SXTB     r1,r1                 ;205

000174  dbf6              BLT      |L1.356|
;;;208    	}
;;;209    }

;;;210    
                          ENDP

                  long2lcd_mmm PROC

;;;212    void long2lcd_mmm(signed long in,char xy,char des)

;;;213    {

;;;241    	     }
;;;242    	else 
;;;243    	     {
;;;244    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;

;;;245    	     zero_on=0;

;;;246    	     simb_num++;

;;;247    	     }
;;;248    	 }
;;;249    	          
;;;250    if(minus=='-')

;;;251         {
;;;252         s[simb_num++]=minus;

;;;262         }

                  long2lcdyx_mmm PROC
;;;271    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;272    void long2lcdyx_mmm(signed long in,char y,char x,char des)

;;;313         }    
;;;314    if(des)
0002c8  b18b              CBZ      r3,|L1.750|
;;;315         {
;;;316         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
0002ca  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
0002cc  e007              B        |L1.734|
                  |L1.718|
;;;317              {
;;;318              s[i]=s[i-1];
0002ce  eb070500          ADD      r5,r7,r0
0002d2  f8155c01          LDRB     r5,[r5,#-1]
0002d6  543d              STRB     r5,[r7,r0]
0002d8  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;316
0002dc  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;316
                  |L1.734|
0002de  4298              CMP      r0,r3                 ;316
0002e0  dcf5              BGT      |L1.718|
;;;319              }
;;;320         s[des]='.';
0002e2  f04f002e          MOV      r0,#0x2e
0002e6  54f8              STRB     r0,[r7,r3]
;;;321         simb_num++;     
0002e8  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
0002ec  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.750|
;;;322         }
;;;323    	
;;;324    n=(20*y)+x;
0002ee  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
0002f2  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
0002f6  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;325    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
0002f8  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;326    	{
;;;327         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];
0002fc  4a41              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
0002fe  e006              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.768|
000300  eba10500          SUB      r5,r1,r0
000304  5c3b              LDRB     r3,[r7,r0]
000306  5553              STRB     r3,[r2,r5]
000308  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;325
00030c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;325
                  |L1.782|
00030e  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;325
000310  dbf6              BLT      |L1.768|
;;;328    	}
;;;329    
;;;330    
;;;331    
;;;332    }
000312  e8bd81fe          POP      {r1-r8,pc}
;;;333    
                          ENDP

                  int2lcdyx PROC
;;;334    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;335    void int2lcdyx(unsigned short in,char y,char x,char des)
000316  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;336    {
000318  460d              MOV      r5,r1
00031a  4616              MOV      r6,r2
00031c  461c              MOV      r4,r3
;;;337    char i;
;;;338    char n;
;;;339    bin2bcd_int(in);
00031e  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;340    bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
000322  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
000324  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000326  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;341    i=(y*20)+x;
00032a  eb050085          ADD      r0,r5,r5,LSL #2
00032e  eb060080          ADD      r0,r6,r0,LSL #2
000332  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;342    for (n=0;n<5;n++)
000334  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;343    	{ 
;;;344    	if(n<des)
;;;345    		{
;;;346    		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
000338  4b33              LDR      r3,|L1.1032|
00033a  4d32              LDR      r5,|L1.1028|
                  |L1.828|
00033c  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;344
00033e  d201              BCS      |L1.836|
000340  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
000342  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.836|
;;;347    		}   
;;;348    	if((n>=des)&&(dig[n]!=0x20))
000344  d307              BCC      |L1.854|
000346  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
000348  2a20              CMP      r2,#0x20
00034a  d004              BEQ      |L1.854|
;;;349    		{
;;;350    		if(!des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	
00034c  b164              CBZ      r4,|L1.872|
;;;351    		else lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
00034e  eb050601          ADD      r6,r5,r1
000352  f8062c01          STRB     r2,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.854|
;;;352       		}   
;;;353    	i--;	
000356  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00035a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00035c  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;342
000360  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;342
000362  2805              CMP      r0,#5                 ;342
000364  d3ea              BCC      |L1.828|
;;;354    	}
;;;355    }
000366  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L1.872|
000368  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]            ;350
00036a  e7f4              B        |L1.854|
;;;356    
                          ENDP

                  sub_bgnd PROC
;;;1494   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1495   void sub_bgnd(char const *adr,char xy,signed char offset)
00036c  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1496   {
00036e  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000370  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000372  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;1497   char temp;
;;;1498   temp=find(xy);
000374  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1499   
;;;1500   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1501   if(temp!=255)
000378  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
00037a  d00c              BEQ      |L1.918|
;;;1502   while (*adr)
;;;1503   	{
;;;1504   	lcd_buffer[temp+offset]=*adr++;
00037c  4a21              LDR      r2,|L1.1028|
;;;1505   	temp++;
00037e  e007              B        |L1.912|
                  |L1.896|
000380  eb000305          ADD      r3,r0,r5              ;1504
000384  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1              ;1504
000388  54d1              STRB     r1,[r2,r3]            ;1504
00038a  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
00038e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.912|
000390  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1502
000392  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1502
000394  d1f4              BNE      |L1.896|
                  |L1.918|
;;;1506       	}
;;;1507   }
000396  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1508   
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd PROC
;;;1298   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1299   void int2lcd(unsigned short in,char xy,char des)
000398  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1300   {
00039a  460d              MOV      r5,r1
00039c  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;1301   char i;
;;;1302   char n;
;;;1303   
;;;1304   bin2bcd_int(in);
00039e  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;1305   bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
0003a2  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
0003a4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0003a6  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;1306   i=find(xy);
0003aa  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0003ac  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1307   for (n=0;n<5;n++)
0003b0  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
;;;1308   	{
;;;1309      	if(!des&&(dig[n]!=' '))
0003b4  4a14              LDR      r2,|L1.1032|
;;;1310      		{
;;;1311      		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	 
0003b6  4d13              LDR      r5,|L1.1028|
                  |L1.952|
0003b8  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.964|
0003ba  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]            ;1309
0003bc  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20              ;1309
0003be  d001              BEQ      |L1.964|
0003c0  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0003c2  e015              B        |L1.1008|
                  |L1.964|
;;;1312      		}
;;;1313      	else 
;;;1314      		{
;;;1315      		if(n<des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
0003c4  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
0003c6  d202              BCS      |L1.974|
0003c8  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0003ca  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0003cc  e010              B        |L1.1008|
                  |L1.974|
;;;1316      		else if (n==des)
0003ce  d108              BNE      |L1.994|
;;;1317      			{
;;;1318      			lcd_buffer[i]='.';
0003d0  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
0003d4  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;1319      			lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
0003d6  eb050600          ADD      r6,r5,r0
0003da  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0003dc  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
0003e0  e006              B        |L1.1008|
                  |L1.994|
;;;1320      			} 
;;;1321      		else if ((n>des)&&(dig[n]!=' ')) lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];   		
0003e2  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0003e4  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
0003e6  d003              BEQ      |L1.1008|
0003e8  eb050600          ADD      r6,r5,r0
0003ec  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.1008|
;;;1322      		}  
;;;1323   		
;;;1324   	i--;	
0003f0  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
0003f4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0003f6  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;1307
0003fa  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1307
0003fc  2905              CMP      r1,#5                 ;1307
0003fe  d3db              BCC      |L1.952|
;;;1325   	}
;;;1326   }
000400  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
000402  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.1028|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.1032|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L1.1036|
                          DCD      zero_on
                          ENDP

                  ptr_carry PROC
;;;1536   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1537   char ptr_carry(signed int in,unsigned char modul,signed int carry)
000410  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
;;;1538   {
;;;1539   signed int tempSI;
;;;1540   tempSI=in;                                                             
;;;1541   tempSI+=carry;
;;;1542   if(tempSI<0)tempSI+=modul;
000412  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000414  da01              BGE      |L1.1050|
000416  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
000418  e003              B        |L1.1058|
                  |L1.1050|
;;;1543   else if(tempSI>=modul)tempSI-=modul;
00041a  4288              CMP      r0,r1
00041c  db01              BLT      |L1.1058|
00041e  eba00001          SUB      r0,r0,r1
                  |L1.1058|
;;;1544   
;;;1545   return (char)tempSI;
000422  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;1546   }
000424  4770              BX       lr
;;;1547   
                          ENDP

                  event2ind PROC
;;;358    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;359    void event2ind(char num, char simbol)
000426  e92d4ffe          PUSH     {r1-r11,lr}
;;;360    {
00042a  4604              MOV      r4,r0
00042c  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;361    char iii;
;;;362    char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;363    unsigned int tempii;    
;;;364    		
;;;365    tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
00042e  f44f6060          MOV      r0,#0xe00
000432  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_int
;;;366    tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));
000436  4262              RSBS     r2,r4,#0
000438  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00043a  f7fffffe          BL       ptr_carry
;;;367    tempii*=32;
00043e  ea4f1040          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;368    tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
000442  f5006080          ADD      r0,r0,#0x400
000446  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;369         
;;;370    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
000448  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
00044a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00044c  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;371    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
000450  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
000452  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
000456  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;372    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
00045a  4669              MOV      r1,sp
00045c  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
000460  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;373    
;;;374    iii=find(simbol);
000464  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000466  f7fffffe          BL       find
00046a  4682              MOV      r10,r0
;;;375         
;;;376    if(dt[0]=='U')
00046c  f89d0008          LDRB     r0,[sp,#8]
;;;377        { 
;;;378        if(dt[2]=='R')
;;;379       		{
;;;380        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';
000470  f8dfb720          LDR      r11,|L1.2964|
;;;381       		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ê';
;;;382        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='ë';
;;;383       		}
;;;384        	
;;;385    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;386    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';     		
;;;387       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;388       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;389    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;390       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;391    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;392       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;393    //	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;394        if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
000474  f8df9720          LDR      r9,|L1.2968|
000478  f04f0740          MOV      r7,#0x40              ;366
;;;395        	{
;;;396        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
00047c  f04f0630          MOV      r6,#0x30
;;;397         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
000480  f04f0821          MOV      r8,#0x21
;;;398         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;399         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;400         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;401         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;402         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;403         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
000484  f04f0523          MOV      r5,#0x23
000488  f04f0420          MOV      r4,#0x20              ;385
00048c  2855              CMP      r0,#0x55              ;376
00048e  d07e              BEQ      |L1.1422|
;;;404         	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;405         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;406         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;407         	}	                   
;;;408    	else      	
;;;409            {
;;;410     		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;411         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;412         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;413         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;414         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;415         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;416         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;417         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;418         	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;419         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;420         	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;421    		sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;422      		}	   
;;;423         }   
;;;424         
;;;425    else if(dt[0]=='P')
;;;426    	{
;;;427      	lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;428        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;429        lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;430        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ï';
000490  21cf              MOVS     r1,#0xcf
;;;431        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ñ';

000496  2850              CMP      r0,#0x50              ;425
000498  d07a              BEQ      |L1.1424|
;;;432    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;433        lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;434    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;435        lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;436    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;437        lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;438    	//lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;439         	
;;;440        if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;441         	{
;;;442             	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;443         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;444        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;445        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;446        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;447         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;448         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;449         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;450             	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;451         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;452         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;453         	}	                   
;;;454        	else      	
;;;455         	{
;;;456          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;457         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;458         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;459         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;460          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;461          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;462          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;463          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;464          	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;465         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;466          	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;467    	 	sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;468      		}     	
;;;469         }   
;;;470    
;;;471    else if(dt[0]=='Q')
;;;472    	{
;;;473      	lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;474        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;475        lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;476        lcd_buffer[iii++]='U';
;;;477        lcd_buffer[iii++]='â';
00049a  22e2              MOVS     r2,#0xe2
00049c  2851              CMP      r0,#0x51              ;471
00049e  d078              BEQ      |L1.1426|
;;;478    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='û';
;;;479        lcd_buffer[iii++]='õ';
;;;480    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;481    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;482    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;483    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;484    		     	
;;;485        if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;486         	{
;;;487             	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;488         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;489        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;490        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;491        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;492         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;493         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;494         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;495             	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;496         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;497         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;498         	}	                   
;;;499        	else      	
;;;500         	{
;;;501          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;502         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;503         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;504         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;505          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;506          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;507          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;508          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;509          	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;510         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;511          	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;512    	 	sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;513      		}     	
;;;514         }   
;;;515    
;;;516    else if(dt[0]=='B')

0004a2  d077              BEQ      |L1.1428|
;;;517        	{
;;;518        	if(dt[2]=='C')
;;;519        		{
;;;520      			lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;521        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;522        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;523        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;524        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='à';
;;;525        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ò';
;;;526    			lcd_buffer[iii++]='N';
;;;527    		if(dt[1]<9)
;;;528        			{
;;;529        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x31+dt[1];
;;;530        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;531        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;532        			}
;;;533        		else if((dt[1]>=9)&&(dt[1]<99))
;;;534        			{
;;;535        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)/10);
;;;536        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)%10);
;;;537        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;538        			}
;;;539        		else 
;;;540        			{
;;;541        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;542        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' '; 
;;;543        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';    		
;;;544        			} 
;;;545        		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;546         	
;;;547        		if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;548        			{
;;;549        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;550       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;551        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;552        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;553        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;554       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;555       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;556       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;557       	 	    	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;558       	 		int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;559       	 		int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;560        			}	                   
;;;561        		else      	
;;;562        			{
;;;563        	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;564        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;565        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;566        	    		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;567        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;568        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;569        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;570        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;571        			int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;572        			int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;573        	    		if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;574    			sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;575        			}
;;;576        		}
;;;577

;;;579        		{

                  community2lcd PROC
;;;1179   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1180   void community2lcd(char* in,
001da0  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;1181   			char xy,
;;;1182   			char flash_pos,
;;;1183   			char flash_on)
;;;1184   {
001da2  4604              MOV      r4,r0
001da4  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001da6  4616              MOV      r6,r2
001da8  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;1185   char temp;
;;;1186   char i;
;;;1187   //char n;
;;;1188   
;;;1189   
;;;1190   i=find(xy);
001daa  f7fffffe          BL       find
001dae  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;1191   
;;;1192   //in1=192;
;;;1193   
;;;1194   //in2=34;
;;;1195   
;;;1196   
;;;1197   
;;;1198   temp=i;
001db0  4610              MOV      r0,r2
;;;1199   
;;;1200   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1201   if(temp!=255)
;;;1202   while (*in)
;;;1203   	{
;;;1204   	lcd_buffer[temp]=*in++;
001db2  4d62              LDR      r5,|L1.7996|
001db4  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff              ;1201
001db6  d106              BNE      |L1.7622|
001db8  e008              B        |L1.7628|
                  |L1.7610|
001dba  5429              STRB     r1,[r5,r0]
001dbc  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
;;;1205   	temp++;
001dc0  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
001dc4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.7622|
001dc6  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1202
001dc8  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1202
001dca  d1f6              BNE      |L1.7610|
                  |L1.7628|
;;;1206       	}
;;;1207   
;;;1208   
;;;1209   
;;;1210   if((bFL2)&&(flash_on))
001dcc  485c              LDR      r0,|L1.8000|
001dce  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bFL2
001dd0  2800              CMP      r0,#0
001dd2  d006              BEQ      |L1.7650|
001dd4  2f00              CMP      r7,#0
001dd6  d004              BEQ      |L1.7650|
;;;1211   	{
;;;1212   	lcd_buffer[i+flash_pos]=95;
001dd8  eb020106          ADD      r1,r2,r6
001ddc  f04f005f          MOV      r0,#0x5f
001de0  5468              STRB     r0,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.7650|
;;;1213   	}
;;;1214   
;;;1215   }
001de2  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;1216   
                          ENDP

                  ip2lcd PROC
;;;1217   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1218   void ip2lcd(	short in1,
001de4  e92d4ff0          PUSH     {r4-r11,lr}
;;;1219   			short in2,
;;;1220   			short in3,
;;;1221   			short in4,
;;;1222   			char xy,
;;;1223   			char flash_pos)
;;;1224   {
001de8  4607              MOV      r7,r0
001dea  e9dd0509          LDRD     r0,r5,[sp,#0x24]
001dee  4688              MOV      r8,r1
001df0  4691              MOV      r9,r2
001df2  469a              MOV      r10,r3
;;;1225   char i;
;;;1226   //char n;
;;;1227   
;;;1228   //bin2bcd_int(in);
;;;1229   //bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
;;;1230   i=find(xy);
001df4  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1231   
;;;1232   //in1=192;
;;;1233   
;;;1234   //in2=34;
;;;1235   
;;;1236   if((flash_pos==1)&&(bFL2))
001df8  4b51              LDR      r3,|L1.8000|
;;;1237   	{
;;;1238   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=' ';
001dfa  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
001dfc  4c4f              LDR      r4,|L1.7996|
;;;1239   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=' ';
;;;1240   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=' ';
;;;1241   	}
;;;1242   else 
;;;1243   	{
;;;1244   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=0x30+(in1%10);
001dfe  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
;;;1245   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=0x30+(in1/10)%10;
;;;1246   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=0x30+(in1/100);
001e00  f04f0c64          MOV      r12,#0x64
001e04  2d01              CMP      r5,#1                 ;1236
001e06  d109              BNE      |L1.7708|
001e08  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]            ;1236  ; bFL2
001e0a  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7708|
001e0c  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1238
001e10  f1a6060e          SUB      r6,r6,#0xe            ;1238
001e14  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]            ;1238
001e16  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]            ;1239
001e18  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]            ;1240
001e1a  e017              B        |L1.7756|
                  |L1.7708|
001e1c  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2             ;1244
001e20  fb027e1b          MLS      lr,r2,r11,r7          ;1244
001e24  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1244
001e28  f10e0e30          ADD      lr,lr,#0x30           ;1244
001e2c  f806ec0c          STRB     lr,[r6,#-0xc]         ;1244
001e30  fb9bfef2          SDIV     lr,r11,r2             ;1245
001e34  fb02bb1e          MLS      r11,r2,lr,r11         ;1245
001e38  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30         ;1245
001e3c  f806bc0d          STRB     r11,[r6,#-0xd]        ;1245
001e40  fb97f7fc          SDIV     r7,r7,r12
001e44  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001e48  f8067c0e          STRB     r7,[r6,#-0xe]
                  |L1.7756|
;;;1247   	}
;;;1248   
;;;1249   if((flash_pos==2)&&(bFL2))
001e4c  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
001e4e  d109              BNE      |L1.7780|
001e50  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001e52  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7780|
;;;1250   	{
;;;1251   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=' ';
001e54  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001e58  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001e5c  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1252   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=' ';
001e5e  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1253   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=' ';
001e60  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
001e62  e017              B        |L1.7828|
                  |L1.7780|
;;;1254   	}
;;;1255   else 
;;;1256   	{
;;;1257   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=0x30+(in2%10);
001e64  fb98f7f2          SDIV     r7,r8,r2
001e68  fb028b17          MLS      r11,r2,r7,r8
001e6c  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001e70  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001e74  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30
001e78  f886b002          STRB     r11,[r6,#2]
;;;1258   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=0x30+(in2/10)%10;
001e7c  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2
001e80  fb02771b          MLS      r7,r2,r11,r7
001e84  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001e88  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1259   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=0x30+(in2/100);
001e8a  fb98f7fc          SDIV     r7,r8,r12
001e8e  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001e92  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.7828|
;;;1260   	}
;;;1261   
;;;1262   if((flash_pos==3)&&(bFL2))
001e94  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
001e96  d109              BNE      |L1.7852|
001e98  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001e9a  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7852|
;;;1263   	{
;;;1264   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=' ';
001e9c  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001ea0  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
001ea4  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1265   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=' ';
001ea6  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1266   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=' ';
001ea8  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
001eaa  e017              B        |L1.7900|
                  |L1.7852|
;;;1267   	}
;;;1268   else 
;;;1269   	{
;;;1270   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=0x30+in3%10;
001eac  fb99f7f2          SDIV     r7,r9,r2
001eb0  fb029817          MLS      r8,r2,r7,r9
001eb4  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001eb8  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
001ebc  f1080830          ADD      r8,r8,#0x30
001ec0  f8868002          STRB     r8,[r6,#2]
;;;1271   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=0x30+(in3/10)%10;
001ec4  fb97f8f2          SDIV     r8,r7,r2
001ec8  fb027718          MLS      r7,r2,r8,r7
001ecc  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001ed0  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1272   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=0x30+(in3/100);
001ed2  fb99f7fc          SDIV     r7,r9,r12
001ed6  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001eda  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.7900|
;;;1273   	}
;;;1274   
;;;1275   if((flash_pos==4)&&(bFL2))
001edc  2d04              CMP      r5,#4
001ede  d109              BNE      |L1.7924|
001ee0  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001ee2  b13b              CBZ      r3,|L1.7924|
;;;1276   	{
;;;1277   	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
001ee4  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
;;;1278   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=' ';
001ee6  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4
001ee8  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2
001eec  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1279   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=' ';
001eee  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
                  |L1.7920|
;;;1280   	}
;;;1281   else 
;;;1282   	{
;;;1283   	lcd_buffer[i]=0x30+in4%10;
;;;1284   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=0x30+(in4/10)%10;
;;;1285   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=0x30+(in4/100);
;;;1286   	}
;;;1287   }
001ef0  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
                  |L1.7924|
001ef4  fb9af1f2          SDIV     r1,r10,r2             ;1283
001ef8  fb02a311          MLS      r3,r2,r1,r10          ;1283
001efc  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30           ;1283
001f00  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]            ;1283
001f02  fb91f3f2          SDIV     r3,r1,r2              ;1284
001f06  fb021113          MLS      r1,r2,r3,r1           ;1284
001f0a  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4              ;1284
001f0c  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2              ;1284
001f10  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1284
001f14  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]            ;1284
001f16  fb9af1fc          SDIV     r1,r10,r12            ;1285
001f1a  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1285
001f1e  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]            ;1285
001f20  e7e6              B        |L1.7920|
;;;1288   
                          ENDP

                  checkboxing PROC
;;;1289   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1290   void checkboxing(char xy,short in)
001f22  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1291   {
001f24  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;1292   char i;
;;;1293   i=find(xy);
001f26  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1294   if(in)lcd_buffer[i]=3;
001f2a  4904              LDR      r1,|L1.7996|
001f2c  b154              CBZ      r4,|L1.8004|
001f2e  f04f0203          MOV      r2,#3
001f32  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
                  |L1.7988|
;;;1295   else lcd_buffer[i]=4;	 
;;;1296   }
001f34  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
001f36  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.7992|
                          DCD      sm_mont
                  |L1.7996|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.8000|
                          DCD      bFL2
                  |L1.8004|
001f44  f04f0204          MOV      r2,#4                 ;1295
001f48  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]            ;1295
001f4a  e7f3              B        |L1.7988|
;;;1297   
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1328   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1329   void long2lcdhyx(unsigned long in,char y,char x)
001f4c  b517              PUSH     {r0-r2,r4,lr}
;;;1330   {
;;;1331   char i;
;;;1332   char n;
;;;1333   
;;;1334   i=(20*y)+x;
001f4e  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
001f52  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
001f56  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0
;;;1335   
;;;1336   n=*((char*)&in);
001f58  f89d3000          LDRB     r3,[sp,#0]
;;;1337   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001f5c  48ce              LDR      r0,|L1.8856|
001f5e  f003010f          AND      r1,r3,#0xf
001f62  5c44              LDRB     r4,[r0,r1]
001f64  49cd              LDR      r1,|L1.8860|
001f66  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1338   i--;
001f68  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001f6c  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1339   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001f6e  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001f72  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001f74  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1340   i--;
001f76  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001f7a  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1341   
;;;1342   n=*(((char*)&in)+1);
001f7c  f89d3001          LDRB     r3,[sp,#1]
;;;1343   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001f80  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
001f84  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001f86  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1344   i--;
001f88  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001f8c  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1345   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001f8e  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001f92  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001f94  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1346   i--;
001f96  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001f9a  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1347   
;;;1348   n=*(((char*)&in)+2);
001f9c  f89d3002          LDRB     r3,[sp,#2]
;;;1349   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001fa0  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
001fa4  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001fa6  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1350   i--;
001fa8  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001fac  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1351   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001fae  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001fb2  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001fb4  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1352   i--;
001fb6  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001fba  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
;;;1353   
;;;1354   n=*(((char*)&in)+3);
001fbc  f89d2003          LDRB     r2,[sp,#3]
;;;1355   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001fc0  f002040f          AND      r4,r2,#0xf
001fc4  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001fc6  54cc              STRB     r4,[r1,r3]
;;;1356   i--;
001fc8  f1a30301          SUB      r3,r3,#1
001fcc  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
;;;1357   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001fce  eb001012          ADD      r0,r0,r2,LSR #4
001fd2  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
001fd4  54c8              STRB     r0,[r1,r3]
;;;1358   i--;
;;;1359   }
001fd6  bd1e              POP      {r1-r4,pc}
;;;1360   
                          ENDP

                  pointer_set PROC
;;;1432   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1433   void pointer_set(char num_of_first_row)
001fd8  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1434   {
;;;1435   if(sub_ind==index_set)lcd_buffer[num_of_first_row*20]=1;
001fda  49b1              LDR      r1,|L1.8864|
001fdc  2401              MOVS     r4,#1
001fde  4baf              LDR      r3,|L1.8860|
001fe0  f9912001          LDRSB    r2,[r1,#1]  ; a_ind
001fe4  f9911004          LDRSB    r1,[r1,#4]  ; a_ind
001fe8  428a              CMP      r2,r1
001fea  d104              BNE      |L1.8182|
001fec  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
001ff0  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]
;;;1436   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+1))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+1)*20]=1;
;;;1437   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+2))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+2)*20]=1;
;;;1438   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+3))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+3)*20]=1;
;;;1439   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+4))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+4)*20]=1;
;;;1440   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+5))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+5)*20]=1;
;;;1441   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+6))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+6)*20]=1;
;;;1442   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+7))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+7)*20]=1;
;;;1443   }
001ff4  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8182|
001ff6  1c4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#1              ;1436
001ff8  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1436
001ffa  d106              BNE      |L1.8202|
001ffc  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1436
002000  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1436
002004  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1436
002008  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8202|
00200a  1c8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#2              ;1437
00200c  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1437
00200e  d106              BNE      |L1.8222|
002010  f1000002          ADD      r0,r0,#2              ;1437
002014  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1437
002018  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1437
00201c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8222|
00201e  1ccd              ADDS     r5,r1,#3              ;1438
002020  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1438
002022  d106              BNE      |L1.8242|
002024  f1000003          ADD      r0,r0,#3              ;1438
002028  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1438
00202c  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1438
002030  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8242|
002032  1d0d              ADDS     r5,r1,#4              ;1439
002034  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1439
002036  d106              BNE      |L1.8262|
002038  f1000004          ADD      r0,r0,#4              ;1439
00203c  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1439
002040  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1439
002044  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8262|
002046  1d4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#5              ;1440
002048  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1440
00204a  d106              BNE      |L1.8282|
00204c  f1000005          ADD      r0,r0,#5              ;1440
002050  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1440
002054  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1440
002058  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8282|
00205a  1d8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#6              ;1441
00205c  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1441
00205e  d106              BNE      |L1.8302|
002060  f1000006          ADD      r0,r0,#6              ;1441
002064  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1441
002068  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1441
                  |L1.8300|
00206c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8302|
00206e  1dc9              ADDS     r1,r1,#7              ;1442
002070  428a              CMP      r2,r1                 ;1442
002072  d1fb              BNE      |L1.8300|
002074  f1000007          ADD      r0,r0,#7              ;1442
002078  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1442
00207c  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1442
002080  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1444   
                          ENDP

                  tree_down PROC
;;;1446   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1447   void tree_down(signed char offset_ind,signed char offset_sub_ind)
002082  4b88              LDR      r3,|L1.8868|
;;;1448   {
;;;1449   ind_pointer--;
002084  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
002086  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
00208a  b212              SXTH     r2,r2
00208c  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
;;;1450   if(ind_pointer<=0)ind_pointer=0;
00208e  2a00              CMP      r2,#0
002090  dc02              BGT      |L1.8344|
002092  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
002096  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
                  |L1.8344|
;;;1451   ind_pointer+=offset_ind;
002098  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
00209a  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
00209c  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
00209e  8018              STRH     r0,[r3,#0]
;;;1452   a_ind=b_ind[ind_pointer];
0020a0  4a81              LDR      r2,|L1.8872|
0020a2  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
0020a6  4402              ADD      r2,r2,r0
0020a8  487d              LDR      r0,|L1.8864|
0020aa  6813              LDR      r3,[r2,#0]
0020ac  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; a_ind
0020ae  7912              LDRB     r2,[r2,#4]
0020b0  7102              STRB     r2,[r0,#4]
;;;1453   
;;;1454   sub_ind+=offset_sub_ind;
0020b2  7842              LDRB     r2,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
0020b4  4411              ADD      r1,r1,r2
0020b6  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1455   }
0020b8  4770              BX       lr
;;;1456   
                          ENDP

                  tree_up PROC
;;;1457   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1458   void tree_up(char tind, char tsub_ind, char tindex_set, char tsub_ind1)
0020ba  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1459   {
;;;1460   b_ind[ind_pointer++]=a_ind;
0020bc  4d79              LDR      r5,|L1.8868|
0020be  f9b54000          LDRSH    r4,[r5,#0]  ; ind_pointer
0020c2  f1040601          ADD      r6,r4,#1
0020c6  802e              STRH     r6,[r5,#0]
0020c8  4d77              LDR      r5,|L1.8872|
0020ca  eb040484          ADD      r4,r4,r4,LSL #2
0020ce  4425              ADD      r5,r5,r4
0020d0  4c73              LDR      r4,|L1.8864|
0020d2  6826              LDR      r6,[r4,#0]  ; a_ind
0020d4  602e              STR      r6,[r5,#0]
0020d6  7926              LDRB     r6,[r4,#4]  ; a_ind
0020d8  712e              STRB     r6,[r5,#4]
;;;1461   ind=(i_enum)tind;
0020da  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;1462   sub_ind=tsub_ind;
0020dc  7061              STRB     r1,[r4,#1]
;;;1463   index_set=tindex_set;
0020de  7122              STRB     r2,[r4,#4]
;;;1464   sub_ind1=tsub_ind1;
0020e0  70a3              STRB     r3,[r4,#2]
;;;1465   }
0020e2  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1466   
                          ENDP

                  bgnd_par PROC
;;;1467   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1468   void bgnd_par(char const *ptr0,char const *ptr1,char const *ptr2,char const *ptr3)
0020e4  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;1469   {
0020e8  4680              MOV      r8,r0
0020ea  460f              MOV      r7,r1
0020ec  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;1470   char i,*ptr_ram;
;;;1471   clr_scrn();
0020ee  f7fffffe          BL       clr_scrn
;;;1472   
;;;1473   ptr_ram=lcd_buffer;
0020f2  4c6a              LDR      r4,|L1.8860|
;;;1474   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
0020f4  f04f0500          MOV      r5,#0
                  |L1.8440|
;;;1475   	{
;;;1476   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr0++;
0020f8  f8180b01          LDRB     r0,[r8],#1
0020fc  f8040b01          STRB     r0,[r4],#1
002100  f1050501          ADD      r5,r5,#1              ;1474
002104  b2ed              UXTB     r5,r5                 ;1474
002106  2d14              CMP      r5,#0x14              ;1474
002108  d3f6              BCC      |L1.8440|
;;;1477   	}
;;;1478   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
00210a  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.8462|
;;;1479   	{
;;;1480   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr1++;
00210e  f8171b01          LDRB     r1,[r7],#1
002112  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
002116  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1478
00211a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1478
00211c  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1478
00211e  d3f6              BCC      |L1.8462|
;;;1481   	}
;;;1482   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
002120  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.8484|
;;;1483   	{
;;;1484   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr2++;
002124  f8161b01          LDRB     r1,[r6],#1
002128  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
00212c  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1482
002130  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1482
002132  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1482
002134  d3f6              BCC      |L1.8484|
;;;1485   	}
;;;1486   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
002136  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.8506|
;;;1487   	{
;;;1488   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr3++;
00213a  f8131b01          LDRB     r1,[r3],#1
00213e  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
002142  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1486
002146  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1486
002148  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1486
00214a  d3f6              BCC      |L1.8506|
;;;1489   	}
;;;1490   
;;;1491   
;;;1492   }
00214c  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;1493   
                          ENDP

                  show_mess PROC
;;;1509   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1510   void show_mess(char* p1, char* p2, char* p3, char* p4,int m_sec)
002150  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1511   {
002152  9c03              LDR      r4,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1512   //bgnd_par(p1,p2,p3,p4);
;;;1513   //tree_up(iSM,sub_ind,sub_ind1,sub_ind2);
;;;1514   //ret((char)(m_sec/100));
;;;1515   show_mess_cnt=(char)(m_sec/100);
002154  f04f0564          MOV      r5,#0x64
002158  fb94f4f5          SDIV     r4,r4,r5
00215c  4d53              LDR      r5,|L1.8876|
00215e  702c              STRB     r4,[r5,#0]
;;;1516   show_mess_p1=p1;
002160  4c53              LDR      r4,|L1.8880|
002162  6020              STR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
;;;1517   show_mess_p2=p2;
002164  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.8884|
002166  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
;;;1518   show_mess_p3=p3;
002168  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.8888|
00216a  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
;;;1519   show_mess_p4=p4;
00216c  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.8892|
00216e  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
;;;1520   }
002170  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1521   //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  event_data2ind PROC
;;;1548   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1549   void event_data2ind(char num, char simbol)
002172  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;1550   {
002176  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;1551   char iii;
;;;1552   char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;1553   unsigned int tempii;    
;;;1554   		
;;;1555   /*tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1556   tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));*/
;;;1557   tempii=(signed)num;
;;;1558   tempii*=32;
002178  ea4f1040          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;1559   tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
00217c  f5006080          ADD      r0,r0,#0x400
002180  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1560        
;;;1561   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
002182  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
002184  4620              MOV      r0,r4
002186  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1562   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
00218a  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
00218c  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
002190  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1563   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
002194  4669              MOV      r1,sp
002196  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
00219a  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1564   
;;;1565   iii=find(simbol);
00219e  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0021a0  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1566   
;;;1567   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
0021a4  4c3d              LDR      r4,|L1.8860|
0021a6  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
0021aa  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0021ae  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0021b0  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1568   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
0021b2  f04f0730          MOV      r7,#0x30
0021b6  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
0021ba  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0021bc  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1569   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
0021be  f04f0821          MOV      r8,#0x21
0021c2  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0021c6  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0021c8  f8048000          STRB     r8,[r4,r0]
;;;1570   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
0021cc  f04f0940          MOV      r9,#0x40
0021d0  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
0021d4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0021d6  f8049001          STRB     r9,[r4,r1]
;;;1571   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
0021da  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0021de  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0021e0  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1572   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
0021e2  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
0021e6  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0021e8  5466              STRB     r6,[r4,r1]
;;;1573   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
0021ea  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0021ee  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0021f0  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1574   lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
0021f2  f04f0223          MOV      r2,#0x23
0021f6  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
0021fa  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
0021fc  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
;;;1575   int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
0021fe  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]
002202  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
002206  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
00220a  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1576   int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
00220e  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]
002212  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
002214  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23
002216  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1577   if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
00221a  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
00221e  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
002220  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc
002222  d303              BCC      |L1.8748|
002224  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
002228  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]
                  |L1.8748|
;;;1578   sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0); 
00222c  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
002230  4923              LDR      r1,|L1.8896|
002232  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
002234  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
002238  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00223a  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
;;;1579   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';		
00223e  f1050001          ADD      r0,r5,#1
002242  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002244  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1580   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
002246  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00224a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00224c  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1581   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
00224e  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002252  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002254  f8048001          STRB     r8,[r4,r1]
;;;1582   lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
002258  f04f023a          MOV      r2,#0x3a
00225c  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
002260  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
002262  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
;;;1583   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
002264  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002268  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00226a  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1584   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
00226c  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
002270  b2cd              UXTB     r5,r1
002272  f8049000          STRB     r9,[r4,r0]
;;;1585   int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
002276  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
00227a  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
00227e  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
002282  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1586   int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
002286  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
00228a  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
00228c  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00228e  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1587      		     		
;;;1588   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
002292  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1589   }	
002294  e8bd83fe          POP      {r1-r9,pc}
                          ENDP

                  |L1.8856|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L1.8860|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.8864|
                          DCD      a_ind
                  |L1.8868|
                          DCD      ind_pointer
                  |L1.8872|
                          DCD      b_ind
                  |L1.8876|

                  |L1.8880|

                  |L1.8884|
                          DCD      show_mess_p2
                  |L1.8888|
                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L1.8892|
                          DCD      show_mess_p4
                  |L1.8896|
                          DCD      sm_mont

                          AREA ||area_number.2||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.2||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_m PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000004  4614              MOV      r4,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da04              BGE      |L2.20|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  ea6f0000          MVN      r0,r0
00000e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
000012  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L2.20|
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
000028  d022              BEQ      |L2.112|
00002a  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002e  4d12              LDR      r5,|L2.120|
000030  4a12              LDR      r2,|L2.124|
                  |L2.50|
000032  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
000034  d202              BCS      |L2.60|
000036  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000038  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
00003a  e011              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.60|
00003c  d108              BNE      |L2.80|
00003e  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000042  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000044  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
000048  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00004a  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
00004e  e007              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.80|
000050  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000052  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000054  d004              BEQ      |L2.96|
000056  b164              CBZ      r4,|L2.114|
000058  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
00005c  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L2.96|
000060  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000064  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000066  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00006a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00006c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00006e  d3e0              BCC      |L2.50|
                  |L2.112|
000070  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L2.114|
000072  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000074  e7f4              B        |L2.96|
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000076  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L2.120|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L2.124|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.3||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.3||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_mm PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460c              MOV      r4,r1
000004  4615              MOV      r5,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da02              BGE      |L3.16|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
00000e  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L3.16|
000010  f04f062d          MOV      r6,#0x2d
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002a  4a1a              LDR      r2,|L3.148|
00002c  4c1a              LDR      r4,|L3.152|
                  |L3.46|
00002e  b97d              CBNZ     r5,|L3.80|
000030  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000032  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000034  d00c              BEQ      |L3.80|
000036  1857              ADDS     r7,r2,r1
000038  787f              LDRB     r7,[r7,#1]
00003a  2f20              CMP      r7,#0x20
00003c  d106              BNE      |L3.76|
00003e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
000040  d104              BNE      |L3.76|
000042  eb040c00          ADD      r12,r4,r0
000046  4637              MOV      r7,r6
000048  f80c7c01          STRB     r7,[r12,#-1]
                  |L3.76|
00004c  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
00004e  e017              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.80|
000050  42a9              CMP      r1,r5
000052  d202              BCS      |L3.90|
000054  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000056  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000058  e012              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.90|
00005a  d108              BNE      |L3.110|
00005c  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000060  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000062  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000066  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000068  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00006c  e008              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.110|
00006e  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000070  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000072  d004              BEQ      |L3.126|
000074  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000078  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00007c  e000              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.126|
00007e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
                  |L3.128|
000080  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000084  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000086  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00008a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00008c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00008e  d3ce              BCC      |L3.46|
000090  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000092  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L3.148|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L3.152|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.4||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.4||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdh PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000006  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4a07              LDR      r2,|L4.40|
00000c  f004010f          AND      r1,r4,#0xf
000010  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000012  4906              LDR      r1,|L4.44|
000014  540b              STRB     r3,[r1,r0]
000016  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  eb021214          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSR #4
000020  7812              LDRB     r2,[r2,#0]
000022  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
000024  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000026  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L4.40|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L4.44|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.5||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.5||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4a06              LDR      r2,|L5.40|
00000e  f000030f          AND      r3,r0,#0xf
000012  5cd4              LDRB     r4,[r2,r3]
000014  4b05              LDR      r3,|L5.44|
000016  545c              STRB     r4,[r3,r1]
000018  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00001c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001e  eb021010          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSR #4
000022  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
000024  5458              STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
000026  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L5.40|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L5.44|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.6||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.6||, ||.text||
                  int2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4b0f              LDR      r3,|L6.76|
00000e  f000020f          AND      r2,r0,#0xf
000012  4c0f              LDR      r4,|L6.80|
000014  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
000016  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
000018  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00001c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001e  ea4f1210          LSR      r2,r0,#4
000022  f002000f          AND      r0,r2,#0xf
000026  5c18              LDRB     r0,[r3,r0]
000028  5460              STRB     r0,[r4,r1]
00002a  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00002e  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000030  ea4f1112          LSR      r1,r2,#4
000034  f001020f          AND      r2,r1,#0xf
000038  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
00003a  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
00003c  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000040  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000042  ea4f1111          LSR      r1,r1,#4
000046  5c59              LDRB     r1,[r3,r1]
000048  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
00004a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L6.76|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L6.80|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.7||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.7||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdbyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
00000c  4921              LDR      r1,|L7.148|
00000e  f0000201          AND      r2,r0,#1
000012  5c8d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r2]
000014  f1a40201          SUB      r2,r4,#1
000018  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
00001a  4a1f              LDR      r2,|L7.152|
00001c  5515              STRB     r5,[r2,r4]
00001e  ea4f0450          LSR      r4,r0,#1
000022  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
000026  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000028  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
00002c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00002e  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000030  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000034  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
000038  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00003a  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
00003e  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000040  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000042  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000046  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00004a  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
00004c  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000050  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000052  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000054  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000058  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
00005c  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00005e  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
000062  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000064  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000066  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
00006a  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00006e  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000070  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000074  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000076  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000078  ea4f0354          LSR      r3,r4,#1
00007c  f0030401          AND      r4,r3,#1
000080  5d0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r4]
000082  f1a00401          SUB      r4,r0,#1
000086  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
000088  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
00008a  ea4f0053          LSR      r0,r3,#1
00008e  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
000090  5510              STRB     r0,[r2,r4]
000092  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L7.148|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L7.152|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.8||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.8||, ||.text||
                  show_mess_number PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  e9dd4606          LDRD     r4,r6,[sp,#0x18]
000006  9d05              LDR      r5,[sp,#0x14]
000008  f04f0764          MOV      r7,#0x64
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000c  fb95f5f7          SDIV     r5,r5,r7
000010  4f07              LDR      r7,|L8.48|
000012  703d              STRB     r5,[r7,#0]
000014  4d07              LDR      r5,|L8.52|
000016  6028              STR      r0,[r5,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
000018  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.56|
00001a  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
00001c  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.60|
00001e  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
000020  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.64|
000022  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
000024  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.68|
000026  8004              STRH     r4,[r0,#0]
000028  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.72|
00002a  7006              STRB     r6,[r0,#0]
00002c  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

00002e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L8.48|
                          DCD      show_mess_cnt
                  |L8.52|
                          DCD      show_mess_p1
                  |L8.56|
                          DCD      show_mess_p2
                  |L8.60|
                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L8.64|
                          DCD      show_mess_p4
                  |L8.68|
                          DCD      show_mess_number_
                  |L8.72|
                          DCD      show_mess_komma
